RPCSETTINGS.MAXCHUNKSIZE: maximum amount of blocks to check in 1 request e.g 3000
RPCSETTINGS.SUCCESSCOUNT: number of sequential successful reads to increase chunk size e.g 5
RPCSETTINGS.CHANGEFACTOR: amount of blocks to increase/decrease on successful/unsuccessful reads e.g 9
RPCSETTINGS.MAXTRIES: maximum number of failed attempts before completely giving up e.g 9

FILESETTINGS.SAVEINTERVAL: time interval to save scan data e.g 600
FILESETTINGS.FILENAME: filename of output file, autogenerated if blank e.g ftmScan

SCANSETTINGS.STARTBLOCK: starting block to begin the scan e.g 62056523
SCANSETTINGS.ENDBLOCK: last block to scan, latest to scan up to latest block, e.g latest
SCANSETTINGS.CONTRACTS: contracts to filter for, empty array for all contract e.g []
ABI: abis of the desired events to be scanned e.g:
